verses.verse: And <S%H8203>Shephatiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4977>Mattan<s%>, and <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6583>Pashhur<s%>, and <S%H3116>Jucal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8018>Shelemiah<s%>, and <S%H6583>Pashhur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4441>Malchijah<s%>, <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> that <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, He that <S%H3427>abideth<s%> in this <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, by the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, and by the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>; but he that goeth <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> shall <S%H2421>live<s%>, and his <S%H5315>life<s%> shall be unto him for a <S%H7998>prey<s%>, and he shall <S%H2421>live<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, This <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H5414>surely<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H2428>army<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and he shall take <S%H3920>it<s%>.

Then the <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, Let this <S%H376>man<s%>, we pray <S%H4191>thee<s%>, be put to death; <S%H3651>forasmuch<s%> as he <S%H7503>weakeneth<s%> the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> that <S%H7604>remain<s%> in this <S%H5892>city<s%>, and the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, in <S%H1696>speaking<s%> such <S%H1697>words<s%> unto <S%H376>them<s%>: for this man <S%H1875>seeketh<s%> not the <S%H7965>welfare<s%> of this <S%H5971>people<s%>, but the <S%H7451>hurt<s%>.

And <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3027>Behold<s%>, he is in your hand; for the <S%H4428>king<s%> is not he that <S%H3201>can<s%> do anything against <S%H1697>you<s%>.

Then <S%H3947>took<s%> they <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> him into the <S%H953>dungeon<s%> of <S%H4441>Malchijah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>, that was in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>guard<s%>: and they let <S%H7971>down<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> with <S%H2256>cords<s%>. And in the <S%H953>dungeon<s%> there was no <S%H4325>water<s%>, but <S%H2916>mire<s%>; and <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H2883>sank<s%> in the <S%H2916>mire<s%>.

Now when <S%H5663>Ebed-melech<s%> the <S%H3569>Ethiopian<s%>, <S%H376>a<s%> <S%H5631>eunuch<s%>, who was in the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H8085>heard<s%> that they had <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> in the <S%H953>dungeon<s%> (the <S%H4428>king<s%> then <S%H3427>sitting<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>,)
Ebed-melech <S%H5663><s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H1696>spake<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

My <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, these <S%H582>men<s%> have done <S%H7489>evil<s%> in all that they have <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, whom they have <S%H7993>cast<s%> into the <S%H953>dungeon<s%>; and he is like to <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H8478>place<s%> where he <S%H6440>is<s%>, because of the <S%H7458>famine<s%>; for there is no more <S%H3899>bread<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H5663>Ebed-melech<s%> the <S%H3569>Ethiopian<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3947>Take<s%> from hence <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> with <S%H3027>thee<s%>, and take <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> out of the <S%H953>dungeon<s%>, before he <S%H4191>die<s%>.

So <S%H5663>Ebed-melech<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> with <S%H3027>him<s%>, and <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> under the <S%H214>treasury<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> thence <S%H5499>rags<s%> and <S%H1094>worn-out<s%> <S%H4418>garments<s%>, and let them <S%H7971>down<s%> by <S%H2256>cords<s%> into the <S%H953>dungeon<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>.

And <S%H5663>Ebed-melech<s%> the <S%H3569>Ethiopian<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, <S%H7760>Put<s%> now these <S%H5499>rags<s%> and <S%H1094>worn-out<s%> <S%H4418>garments<s%> under thine <S%H679>armholes<s%> under the <S%H2256>cords<s%>. And <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> did <S%H6213>so<s%>.

So they drew <S%H4900>up<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> with the <S%H2256>cords<s%>, and took him <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H953>dungeon<s%>: and <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H3427>remained<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>guard<s%>.

Then <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> unto him into the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3996>entry<s%> that is in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, I will <S%H7592>ask<s%> thee a <S%H1697>thing<s%>; hide nothing from <S%H3582>me<s%>.

Then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%>, If I <S%H5046>declare<s%> it unto <S%H4191>thee<s%>, wilt thou not surely put me to <S%H4191>death<s%>? and if I give thee <S%H3289>counsel<s%>, thou wilt not hearken unto <S%H8085>me<s%>.

So <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7650>sware<s%> <S%H5643>secretly<s%> unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, As <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>, that <S%H6213>made<s%> us this <S%H5315>soul<s%>, I will not put thee to <S%H4191>death<s%>, neither will I <S%H5414>give<s%> thee into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of these <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H1245>seek<s%> thy <S%H5315>life<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> unto <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: If thou <S%H3318>wilt<s%> go <S%H3318>forth<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>'s <S%H8269>princes<s%>, then thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H2421>live<s%>, and this <S%H5892>city<s%> shall not be <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H2421>live<s%>, and thy <S%H1004>house<s%>.

But if thou wilt not go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>'s <S%H8269>princes<s%>, then shall this <S%H5892>city<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>, and they shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> it with <S%H784>fire<s%>, and thou shalt not escape <S%H4422>out<s%> of their <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, I am <S%H1672>afraid<s%> of the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> that are <S%H5307>fallen<s%> away to the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>, lest they <S%H5414>deliver<s%> me into their <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and they mock <S%H5953>me<s%>.

But <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, They shall not <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H8085>thee<s%>. Obey, I beseech <S%H6963>thee<s%>, the voice of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, in that which I <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto <S%H3190>thee<s%>: so it shall be well with <S%H5315>thee<s%>, and thy soul shall <S%H2421>live<s%>.
But if thou <S%H3986>refuse<s%> to go <S%H3318>forth<s%>, this is the <S%H1697>word<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath showed <S%H7200>me<s%>:

behold <S%H802><s%>, all the women that are <S%H7604>left<s%> in the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> shall be brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>'s <S%H8269>princes<s%>, and those women shall <S%H559>say<s%>, Thy familiar <S%H582>friends<s%> have set thee <S%H5496>on<s%>, and have <S%H3201>prevailed<s%> over <S%H7272>thee<s%>: now that thy feet are <S%H2883>sunk<s%> in the <S%H1206>mire<s%>, they are turned <S%H5472>away<s%> <S%H268>back<s%>.

And they shall bring <S%H3318>out<s%> all thy <S%H802>wives<s%> and thy <S%H1121>children<s%> to the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>; and thou shalt not escape <S%H4422>out<s%> of their <S%H3027>hand<s%>, but shalt be <S%H8610>taken<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>: and thou shalt cause this <S%H5892>city<s%> to be <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, Let no <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> of these <S%H1697>words<s%>, and thou shalt not <S%H4191>die<s%>.

But if the <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> that I have <S%H1696>talked<s%> with <S%H935>thee<s%>, and they come unto <S%H559>thee<s%>, and say unto <S%H5046>thee<s%>, Declare unto us now what thou hast <S%H1696>said<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>; <S%H3582>hide<s%> it not from <S%H4191>us<s%>, and we will not put thee to death; also what the <S%H4428>king<s%> said unto <S%H1696>thee<s%>:

then thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H5307>them<s%>, I presented my <S%H8467>supplication<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, that he would not cause me to <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, to die <S%H4191>there<s%>.

Then <S%H935>came<s%> all the <S%H8269>princes<s%> unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, and <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H5046>him<s%>; and he told them according to all these <S%H1697>words<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%>. So they left off <S%H2790>speaking<s%> with <S%H1697>him<s%>; for the matter was not <S%H8085>perceived<s%>.
So <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H3427>abode<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>guard<s%> until the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> was <S%H3920>taken<s%>.
